title: Crime Alert 10.18.22
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.18.22
description:
Teacher tells fifth grade girl that she's on the teacher's kill list.  Two men get into a road rage incident and end up shooting the other's daughter.  Florida postal works schemes to send cocaine through the mail.  Mom arrested after allowing her 10-year-old to get a huge tattoo.

For more crime and justice news, go to crimeonline.com 

 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
